signature.note: The Bleed is quite weak, but since it is guaranteed, it essentially remains on the opponent throughout the entire fight.
signature.name: Duodenum Poke

2.name: Spinny Sword Attack
2.description: 100% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 284% of your attack as direct damage over 4 seconds.

3.description: 100% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 245% of your attack as direct damage over 3 seconds.
3.name: Hold Up

gameplay.note: This version of Deadpool lacks regeneration, making him more fragile.
gameplay.description: Deadpool’s consistent and powerful Bleed effects allow him to quickly tear through heavily armored enemies such as Rhino, Juggernaut and Superior Iron Man.
gameplay.name: Offensive
